definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Song on the man-made tea for picking requires very high.
sentences.chinese: 宋人造上品茶對採茶則要求極高。

sentences.english: If you must do something else, have some tea.
sentences.chinese: 如必須做點雜事，且靜品茶一杯。

sentences.english: The shape of finished tea straight micro-flat, bright light green soup.
sentences.chinese: 成品茶外形條直微扁，湯色淺綠明亮。

sentences.english: Dou tea is the highest expression of ancient tea art form.
sentences.chinese: 鬥茶是古代品茶藝術的最高表現形式。

sentences.english: Trade can be slow, and a gaggle of bored shopkeepers sit around a table sipping tea as a couple of college-aged students browse for gifts for their professors.
sentences.chinese: 貿易可能進行緩慢，一羣無聊的商販坐在一起品茶。

sentences.english: Sometimes I want to have cups of tea with friend as a petty bourgeoisie.
sentences.chinese: 有時候我想和朋友一起去品茶，偶爾享受小資的生活。

sentences.english: One day, when drinking the tea, there is a red lightning appeared behind Wang Xun.
sentences.chinese: 一天，品茶時，王洵身後突然出現一道紅色閃電。

sentences.english: The tasters are coming up with a tea with an oriental flavour.
sentences.chinese: 品茶師正在考慮一種東方口味的茶。

sentences.english: Tea drinking has gradually become an important custom of the West Lake.
sentences.chinese: 品茶逐漸成爲西湖的重要習俗而傳衍至今。

sentences.english: Rachid tastes the tea and spits it out.
sentences.chinese: 他品茶並將其分辨出來。

sentences.english: Sip the four cups of tea one by one.
sentences.chinese: 品茶，逐一品賞各杯茶水。

sentences.english: Hangzhou is famous for its beautiful scenery; drinking tea in the open air is an agreeable enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 杭州以秀美的景色聞名，在露天品茶是種享受。

definition: (fig.) to have a meeting with state security agents (to be warned to behave "responsibly")
to have tea and refreshments/to have dimsum lunch (Cantonese)
very concentrated type of tea drunk in Chaozhou, Fujian and Taiwan
biluochun or pi lo chun, a type of green tea grown in the Dongting Mountain region near Lake Tai 太湖[Tai4 Hu2], Jiangsu
to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
